AuthorDetails.Name: Paul Seal
AuthorDetails.Description: Paul is an Umbraco Master and 5 x Umbraco MVP who loves making tutorials and small Umbraco packages. He works for the Umbraco Gold Partner ClerksWell

Description: A package for quickly building block list based Umbraco websites all from data attributes in your HTMl
Title: QuickBlocks

Screenshots.Caption: QuickBlocks Dashboard with some custom HTML with data attributes in it.
Block List automatically created for you with a portfolio row
The block list data type is used for a property on the home page
Editing a portfolio row with properties including another list
Backoffice view of a portfolio item being edited
